meanings.sent1: I used two toonies to buy a snack at the vending machine.
meanings.sent2: The cashier handed me a handful of toonies as change.
meanings.sent3: The toonies in my piggy bank were jingling happily.
meanings.sent4: The toonies clinked together like tiny silver bells.
meanings.sent5: The shiny toonies sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Plural form of 'toony', meaning a humorous or exaggerated cartoon character.
meanings.sent1: My favorite cartoon features wacky toonies with big personalities.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a whole cast of colorful toonies for the show.
meanings.sent3: The toonies on TV always make me laugh with their silly antics.
meanings.sent4: The toonies in the comic strip seemed to jump off the page.
meanings.sent5: The toonies in the movie were so lifelike, they felt real.
